attributes.action: Protect the Army from further cuts
attributes.additional_details: This is in response that the Army is to be cut from 102,000 soldiers to 82,000 that is unacceptably high and  the defence of our country and realm are at risk. if we continue to cut in this way the only conclusion is that our men and women will be put at an unacceptable risk level. We want the government to reconsider and not make these cuts protect the brave men and women who serve this country every day
